Name: Octave
About the game: Octave is a point 'n click horror-adventure game with elements of action and quest. You play the role of a guy who happens to be in the wrong place at the wrong time. You are dragged into a dark forest, but on the verge of death, you are mysteriously saved from your killer by a someone or something. As you venture deeper into the woods you find yourself surrounded by atrocity. You realise that salvation can turn out to be a real nightmare. All the way through fear you seek out the mysteries of the dark forest. The struggle for life has only just begun! In the game you will see: an atmospheric dark forest with creepy shadows and monsters an old house full of puzzles and paranormal activities the underworld, where you have to run a lot
